Message:
I can’t get involved with
all these stories I encounter
during my travels.

That’s the path that
wanderers must walk.

When the time comes for
my true power to return,
I have to throw away
everything that I am.

But...I now know
the beauty of this place.

So while I’m here,
I’m sure that won’t happen.

It’s thanks to you and
everyone here, my lord.

I mean, out of
everything I’ve seen,

you made this the place
I feel I can love the most.

May good fortune keep
on coming to you and
your friends, my lord.

From here on out,
the good people of
this world will always
have Soteira’s blessing.
